resources.string: Why can\'t I login into the app?
You must be assigned a mentor before you log in. If that\'s not the case then re-enter your login credentials.
How do I request a meeting with my mentor?
Click on the button located at the right corner of the dashboard -> Dropdown menu will appear -> then click Request Meeting.
Is the Mentor Connect app for Android only?
Yes, it is but in the near future we will have an iOS version open to the public as well.
How do I view my Profile?
Click on the dropdown menu on the left corner of your screen -> Then click on the Account tab.
How do I signup as a Faculty Mentor?

Click on the register button in the mainpage and enter your credentials -> After you registered, enter your login credentials and click on the slide button under the password field to sign in as a Mentor.
How was Mentor U Connect developed?

Mentor U Connect was created with input from both students and faculty, all seeking more invested mentoring relationships at NJIT. Mentor U Connect allows students to search for mentors in dimensions that are not strictly academic or scholastic.
I have a question that was not answered here. How do I contact the Mentor Connect team?
You can contact the team at mentoruconnect@njit.edu for any other questions/concerns you may have with the app/program.
